mapper.insert: insert into user_info (userid, username, password, nickname, phone, photoid, createdatetime, delflage) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{photoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delflage,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user_info set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, photoid = #{photoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdatetime = #{createdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delflage = #{delflage,jdbcType=INTEGER} where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select userid, username, password, nickname, phone, photoid, createdatetime, delflage from user_info
